title: Crypto exec: U.S. Labor Department 'is right' about 401(k) warning - Yahoo Finance
content: Crypto exec: U.S. Labor Department 'is right' about 401(k) warning  Yahoo Finance
description: The U.S. Labor Departmentâ€™s (DOL) stark warning on Thursday to fiduciaries who offer cryptocurrency investments inside 401(k) plans makes sense, one crypto executive told Yahoo Finance.
